Package eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.container

Containers are elements which contain other elements and apply layouts on them.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HCPBorderContainer
    Paints up to five HCPElements, one for the center and four for each side.
    HCPBorderContainer.Builder
    Mutable class used to construct HCPBorderContainer instances.
    HCPContainers
    Utility class for creating standard containers.
    HCPGridContainer
    Paints a 2-dimensional grid of HCPElements.
    HCPStack
    Paints multiple HCPElements on top of each other.
    HCPTableContainer
    Paints a table of HCPElements.
    HCPTableContainer.Builder
    Mutable class used to construct HCPTableContainer instances.
    HCPTablePosition
    Describes the position of an HCPElement inside an HCPTableContainer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HCPTableContainer.HCPSpanDistributionPolicy
    Specifies how the widths or heights of a series of columns or rows should be adjusted if an element spanning over that series needs more space than available.

Package eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.container Description

Containers are elements which contain other elements and apply layouts on them.
